basics.name: Leatrice Belding
basics.label: Architect
basics.summary: I am a web developer specializing in ruby on rails and javascript, namely backbone. J's. I come from an engineering background, which drives me to make my projects durable and intuitive.

references.reference: I worked closely with Leatrice during his first few months at the same team. He was always eager to learn and picked up new skills and techniques quite quickly. It's long before he moved on to be a real leader of his team and proved to be a real asset to the company. I enjoyed my time working with Leatrice and would definitely work with him again., Leatrice is a developer of rare skill and is eager to learn new things. I had the pleasure of working with him on my final project at dev Bootcamp, where we spent 100 + hours over 7 days building a fully functional web app brain quickly.
